trans-unit.source: Generates IDs for objects.
trans-unit.target: Genererer IDer for objekter.

trans-unit.source: The ObjectIDGenerator keeps track of previously identified objects.
trans-unit.target: ObjectIDGenerator holder oversikt over tidligere identifiserte objekter.

trans-unit.source: When you ask for the ID of an object, the ObjectIDGenerator knows whether to return the existing ID, or generate and remember a new ID.
trans-unit.target: Når du ber om IDen til et objekt, vet ObjectIDGenerator om å returnere den eksisterende ID eller generere og Husk en ny ID.

trans-unit.source: The IDs are unique for the life of the ObjectIDGenerator instance.
trans-unit.target: IDene er unike levetid ObjectIDGenerator-forekomst.

trans-unit.source: Generally, a ObjectIDGenerator life lasts as long as the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatter> that created it.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis varer ObjectIDGenerator levetid så lenge <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatter>som opprettet det.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatter>

trans-unit.source: Object IDs have meaning only within a given serialized stream, and are used for tracking which objects have references to others within the serialized object graph.
trans-unit.target: Objekt-IDer har betydning bare i en gitt serialisert dataflyt, og brukes til å spore hvilke objekter har referanser til andre i diagrammet serialiserte objektet.

trans-unit.source: Using a hash table, the ObjectIDGenerator retains which ID is assigned to which object.
trans-unit.target: Bruker en hash-tabell, beholder ObjectIDGenerator ID som er tilordnet som objekt.

trans-unit.source: The object references, which uniquely identify each object, are addresses in the runtime garbage-collected heap.
trans-unit.target: Objektreferanser som identifiserer hvert objekt, er adresser i runtime ugyldige samlet heapen.

trans-unit.source: Object reference values can change during serialization, but the table is updated automatically so the information is correct.
trans-unit.target: Objekt referanseverdier kan endre under serialisering, men tabellen oppdateres automatisk slik at informasjonen er riktig.

trans-unit.source: Object IDs are 64-bit numbers.
trans-unit.target: Objekt-IDer er 64-biters tall.

trans-unit.source: Allocation starts from one, so zero is never a valid object ID.
trans-unit.target: Tildelingen begynner fra én, så null ikke er et gyldig objekt-IDen.

trans-unit.source: A formatter can choose a zero value to represent an object reference whose value is `null`.
trans-unit.target: En formatering kan velge en nullverdi til å representere en objektreferanse der verdien er `null`.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ObjectIDGenerator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ObjectIDGenerator"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Returns the ID for the specified object, generating a new ID if the specified object has not already been identified by the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ObjectIDGenerator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer IDen for det angitte objektet til å generere en ny ID hvis det angitte objektet ikke er allerede identifisert av den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ObjectIDGenerator"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The object you want an ID for.
trans-unit.target: Objektet du vil ha en ID for.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if `obj` was not previously known to the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ObjectIDGenerator"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis `obj` ble tidligere kanskje ikke i <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ObjectIDGenerator"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The object's ID is used for serialization.
trans-unit.target: Objektets-IDen er brukt for serialisering.

trans-unit.source: firstTime is set to if this is the first time the object has been identified; otherwise, it is set to .
trans-unit.target: firstTimeer satt til Hvis dette er første gang objektet er identifisert; Hvis ikke, den er satt til .

trans-unit.source: The obj parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The obj parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ObjectIDGenerator"></xref> has been asked to keep track of too many objects.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ObjectIDGenerator"> </xref> er blitt bedt om å holde oversikt over for mange objekter.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an object has already been assigned an ID.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om et objekt er allerede tilordnet en ID.

trans-unit.source: If the object has already been assigned an ID, the ID is returned and `firstTime` is set to `false`; otherwise, zero is returned and `firstTime` is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis objektet er allerede tilordnet en ID, returneres IDen og `firstTime` er satt til `false`; Hvis ikke, returneres null og `firstTime` er satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: HasId differs from <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ObjectIDGenerator.GetId%2A> in that it never creates an ID for an object that has not already been seen by the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ObjectIDGenerator>.
trans-unit.target: HasId er forskjellig fra <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ObjectIDGenerator.GetId%2A>ved at den ikke oppretter en ID for et objekt som ikke allerede er sett av <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ObjectIDGenerator>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ObjectIDGenerator> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ObjectIDGenerator.GetId%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object you are asking for.
trans-unit.target: Objektet du ber om.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if `obj` was not previously known to the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ObjectIDGenerator"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis `obj` ble tidligere kanskje ikke i <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ObjectIDGenerator"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The object ID of obj if previously known to the ; otherwise, zero.
trans-unit.target: Objekt-IDen til obj Hvis tidligere kjent den ; ellers null.

trans-unit.source: The obj parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The obj parameter is .
